summary: An entertaining "rockumentary" about Radiohead that shows some of the tedium of being a rock star, as well as some of the fun stuff.
cast: Radiohead|Thom Yorke|Jonny Greenwood|Ed O'Brien|Colin Greenwood|Phil Selway|Nigel Godrich|David Letterman|Michael Sailer|Michael Stipe
title: Meeting People Is Easy
